get_account.label: Account
get_account.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u '<client_id>:<client_secret>' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/identity/openidconnect/userinfo/?schema=openid' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

get_payments.label: Payments
get_payments.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u '<client_id>:<client_secret>' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/payments/payment' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

webhooks.label: Webhooks
webhooks.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u '<client_id>:<client_secret>' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/notifications/webhooks' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

balance.label: Balance
balance.curl: access_token=$(curl -s -X POST 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/oauth2/token' -u '<client_id>:<client_secret>' -d 'grant_type=client_credentials' | jq -r '.access_token') && curl -X GET 'https://api.paypal.com/v1/reporting/balances' -H 'Authorization: Bearer $access_token'

Account.label: Account
Account.curl:
curl -X GET 'https://app.posthog.com/api/users/@me/?personal_api_key=<api_key>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' 
 OR curl -X GET 'https://eu.posthog.com/api/users/@me/?personal_api_key=<api_key>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json'

viewer.curl: curl -X POST "https://api.wandb.ai/graphql" -H "Authorization: Basic $(echo -n "api:352e4131fdd440b77446cf8c722bc9ec78c3d846" | base64)" -d '{"query": "query Viewer { viewer { id username email admin } }"}'
